dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint- Blackwell Publishing
dmca.body:
30th January 2007

Attn: Blogger Legal Support
DMCA complaints
Google, Inc.
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View
CA 94043
USA

By fax & post: 001 650 618 2680

Blackwell Publishing

Blackwell Publishing Ltd
9600 Garsington Road
Oxford OX4 2DD, UK

Tel: +44(0)1865 776868
Fax: +44(0)1865 714591

Dear Sir/Madam

medical-ebooks.blogspot.com

We are the publishers of the attached list of titles, which are copyright works in which we own the worldwide exclusive publishing rights. These exclusive rights are protected under copyright law and internationally under the Berne Convention.

It has come to our attention that the above blog site is engaged in the electronic distribution of copies of the attached list of titles without our consent via their website, http://medical-ebooks.blogspot.com.

My full contact details are at the foot of this letter.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

I look forward to hearing from you.

Yours faithfully

Sue Mattingley
Senior Rights Controller

Tel: +44 1865 476132
Fax: +44 1865 471132
e-mail: sue.mattingley@oxon.blackwellpublishing.com
